member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationAudioLooping
member.summary: Specifies the looping behavior for app notification audio.

member.summary: Audio is looped.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationAudioLooping.None
member.summary: Audio is not looped.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationBuilder
member.summary: Provides APIs for creating the XML string that defines the UI for app notifications.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AppNotificationBuilder class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationBuilder.AddArgument(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an argument composed of a key/value pair to the XML payload for an app notification.
member.param: A string containing the key of the argument.
A string containing the value of the argument.
member.returns: Returns the AppNotificationBuilder instance so that additional method calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationBuilder.AddButton(Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationButton)
member.summary: Adds a button to the app notification.
member.param: An AppNotificationButton object representing the button to be added to the notification.
member.returns: Returns the AppNotificationBuilder instance so that additional method calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationBuilder.AddComboBox(Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationComboBox)
member.summary: Adds a combo box to the XML payload for an app notification.
member.param: An AppNotificationComboBox object representing the combo box to be added to the notification.
member.returns: Returns the AppNotificationBuilder instance so that additional method calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationBuilder.AddProgressBar(Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationProgressBar)
member.summary: Adds a progress bar to the XML payload for an app notification.
member.param: An AppNotificationProgressBar representing the progress bar to be added to the notification.
member.returns: Returns the AppNotificationBuilder instance so that additional method calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationBuilder.AddText(System.String,Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationTextProperties)
member.summary: Adds a block of text, with display and localization options, to the XML payload for an app notification.
member.param: A string containing the text to be displayed on the app notification.
An AppNotificationTextProperties specifying display and localization properties for the text.
member.returns: Returns the AppNotificationBuilder instance so that additional method calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationBuilder.AddText(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a block of text to the XML payload for an app notification.
member.param: A string containing the text to be displayed on the app notification.
member.returns: Returns the AppNotificationBuilder instance so that additional method calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationBuilder.AddTextBox(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a text box with the specified placeholder text and title to the XML payload for an app notification.
member.param: The ID of the text box.
The placeholder text displayed in the text box.
The title text which is displayed above the text box.
member.returns: Returns the AppNotificationBuilder instance so that additional method calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationBuilder.AddTextBox(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a text box to the XML payload for an app notification.
member.param: The ID of the text box.
member.returns: Returns the AppNotificationBuilder instance so that additional method calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationBuilder.BuildNotification
member.summary: Returns an AppNotification object representing the XML payload for an app notification.
member.returns: An AppNotification object.

member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the urgent app notification scenario is supported on the current device.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationTextProperties.SetLanguage(System.String)
member.summary: Sets a value specifying the language of the associated text.
member.param: A string containg an IETF language tag specifying the language of the associated text.
member.returns: Returns the AppNotificationTextProperties instance so that additional method calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationTextProperties.SetMaxLines(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the maximum number of lines the associated text should span.
member.param: The maximum number of lines the associated text should span.
member.returns: Returns the AppNotificationTextProperties instance so that additional method calls can be chained.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationTextProperties.IncomingCallAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the associated text is aligned for an incoming call.
member.returns: True if the associated text uses incoming call alignment; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationTextProperties.Language
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the language of the associated text.
member.returns: A string containg an IETF language tag specifying the language of the associated text.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.AppNotifications.Builder.AppNotificationTextProperties.MaxLines
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of lines the associated text should span.
member.returns: The maximum number of lines.
